mqtt::message

mqtt::message Class Reference

An MQTT message holds the application payload and options specifying how the message is to be delivered The message includes a "payload" (the body of the message) represented as a byte array. More...

class async_client
 The client has special access.

Detailed Description

An MQTT message holds the application payload and options specifying how the message is to be delivered The message includes a "payload" (the body of the message) represented as a byte array.
